A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Folks...this movie looked great\, but that was impossible to truly appreciate due to illogical and downright idiotic writing.  A ridiculous plot and virtually no character development.  Who are our heroes? If you can help me get to know them\, please do.  Its not even about being faithful to the saga\, that's another discussion.  This\, as a stand alone film\, was difficult to get through.
